item.title: NOV
item.description: score:148 Chances: NOV Inc. has announced that it will pay a dividend of $0.05 per share on the 28th of March, indicating potential value for shareholders. The company has also reported increased revenue and operating profit compared to the previous year, showing positive financial performance.
